Ratings.comment: One of the most talented, amazing Officers the Air Force has to offer. He is sharp as a tack and knows the art of leading people. He takes the time to know his students and genuinely cares about everyone. He goes out of his way to help you.
He used to be a reservist, so he'll shoot you straight. Sporty.
Great professor. He cares a lot about each of his students, and is a great model officer.

Lt Col Bone is an amazing teacher. Even though the class starts early in the morning, I never have any trouble staying awake. He always incorporates things into the class that make me motived to not only do better in school but to be a better person. I highly recommend taking this class if you are interested in learning more about leadership.
